entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LazyLoaded Properties are not Obfuscator-safe #25720
    customer-reported
  • Report connection security: using SSL or not. #25719
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 5.0 Operand type clash : nvarchar(4000) is incopataible with decimal(19,3) #25713
    customer-reported
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert #25712
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-save-changes, area-sqlserver, 6.0.0
  • Order By Date Descending Doesn't Return Correctly #25706
    customer-reported
  • Migrations: Problem with 3 nested levels of owned type properties #25704
    customer-reported
  • Using EF & SQLite crashes in aspnet:5.0-alpine docker image with Segmentation Fault #25703
    customer-reported
  • Cosmos: translate indexing into collection #25701
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-cosmos
  • Cosmos: translate Length/Count on collections #25700
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-cosmos
  • Avoid pushdown when applying OrderBy over Distinct #25698
    type-enhancement, area-query
  • Missing ORDER BY #25696
    closed-by-design, customer-reported
  • Can't create tables in sqlite file #25694
    customer-reported

Closed

  • EF Core Migration Bundles: dotnet ef 6.0.0-preview.7.21378.4: No --output option #25699
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Nested self referencing objects not correctly assigned to objects #24368
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • InMemory database provider fails to execute Automapper-generated LINQ query with Select() mapping to List<int> #24047
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported, area-query
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #25680
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #24708
    type-enhancement, area-test, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • [Cosmos] ISO date time strings are not read back correctly from the database #25656
    closed-external, customer-reported
  • Perf regression in NavigationsQuerySqliteTests.PredicateAcrossOptionalNavigation[Async=false&Filter=false] #23915
    type-bug, area-perf, closed-could-not-reproduce
  • Foreign key facets are not propagated from the principal properties #15339
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, punted-for-3.0, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • SelectMany with nested navigation throws #12329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, punted-for-3.0, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Query with nested select statement no longer work in EF Core 3.0 when using owned types #18582
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Cosmos Provider - Date in Primary Key cannot be later deleted #25100
    type-bug, closed-fixed, breaking-change, customer-reported, area-cosmos, 6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Add Include support #16920
    type-enhancement, propose-close, area-query, area-cosmos, Backlog
  • Frequent deadlocks on concurrent inserts with identity columns #25345
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-save-changes, area-sqlserver, 6.0.0
  • Sql server: Wrong translation for default(DateTime)/default(Guid)/default(TimeSpan) in linq projection #24075
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, area-sqlserver
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient 3.0.0 breaks async enumeration of results of SQL Server query including null rowversion value #25074
    type-bug, closed-external, customer-reported, area-query
  • Different orders of Include()/Where() in queries produce different results #24953
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Scaffold tool can create an inverse property with a similar name to a column property and get confused #25292
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • Issue with RollbackToSavepointAsync not working after a DbCommand failure due to Geography column (NetTopologySuite) #24818
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-save-changes, 6.0.0
  • Test failures in latest main #22901
    type-bug, area-test, customer-reported
  • Scaffolding doesn't generate default values #25654
    customer-reported
  • Push queries on lazy navigation properties to database (a.k.a extra lazy loading) #1204
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-change-tracking, area-o/c-mapping, Backlog
  • FK constraint failed when re-adding entity #21949
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Stop all migrations and roll back everything on failure #22616
    type-enhancement, needs-design, area-migrations, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Bug when calling DetectChanges repeatedly #21910
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-change-tracking
  • Migrations: Provider-rendered annotations in code #6546
    type-enhancement, area-migrations, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • Allow [NotParameterized] to work for query filters #25630
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-query, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve insert perf for store-generated values #25718
  • Fix to #24953 - Different orders of Include()/Where() in queries produce different results #25716
  • Metadata: Find inverse property navigation case sensitive first #25714
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25707
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Reenable previously flaky Union_non_entity #25705
  • Detatching principal keeps track of unreferenced dependents #25702
  • More links to conceptual docs #25697

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25717
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Add regression test for #24368 #25715
  • Query: Add regression test for #25680 #25709
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25711
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25710
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25708
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix to #24708 - Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #25690
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25686
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25695
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [SMALL] Fully printing include tree structure #25693
  • Add MigrationsModelDiffer tests for propagating facets #25691
  • Query: Add regression test for #12329 #25687
  • Query: Add regression test for #18582 #25685
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25692
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
